channel.title: Tele blocking in a certain area
channel.description:
Ok, so i want to make a jail.... but then i say to myself "THERE JUST GOING TO TELE OUT OF IT!!!!" so then i start trying to figure out how to make it so they are tele blocked in that area... all my trys have failed.... can someone help me??? I'll repeat again what I'm requesting....
I need to know how to make it so when you stand in a certain area..... like varrock bank or something..... it tele blocks you!!!! Please help me...

item.title: Tele blocking in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

[quote=“Slivion, post:13, topic:70276”]I’m not sure that this could work.
You could make a void that entangles you for lets says five thousand seconds.
Then make another void that checks if your in jail.
That would use something with the coordinates.
Then on the commands declare both voids.[/quote]

very true but idk how… see im not really a java expert

[quote=“r1ch kid, post:11, topic:70276”]public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) { if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true; if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } return false; }
credits zammy!! i guess[br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 04:42:45 AM[/size][hr]idk if it will work tho
post if worked plz[/quote]

did not work[br][size=1]Posted on: March 24, 2007, 08:37:45 AM[/size][hr]can anyone help me?

I tryed max’s tut but me and him could not figure out how to fix it… it just did not do anything… plz help me someone

Read full topic

item.title: Tele blocking in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @Slivion Slivion
item.description:
@Slivion wrote:

I’m not sure that this could work.
You could make a void that entangles you for lets says five thousand seconds.
Then make another void that checks if your in jail.
That would use something with the coordinates.
Then on the commands declare both voids.

Read full topic

item.title: Tele blocking in a certain area

item.description:
@r1ch_kid wrote:

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) { if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true; if(teleblock) { sendMessage("A magical force stops you from teleporting."); } return false; }

item.title: Tele blocking in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @zammy1 zammy!!
item.description:
@zammy1 wrote:

try

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) {
    if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true;
teleblock = true;
    return false;
  }

this always helps

public boolean isInArea(int x, int y, int x2, int y2) { if ((absX >= x && absX <= x2) && (absY <= y && absY >= y2)) return true; return false; }

item.title: Tele blocking in a certain area
item.dc:creator: @jungledude jungledude
item.description:
@jungledude wrote:

Ok, so i want to make a jail… but then i say to myself “THERE JUST GOING TO TELE OUT OF IT!!!” so then i start trying to figure out how to make it so they are tele blocked in that area… all my trys have failed… can someone help me??? I’ll repeat again what I’m requesting…

I need to know how to make it so when you stand in a certain area… like varrock bank or something… it tele blocks you!!! Please help me…

Read full topic
